name: Amunra
description: Amun-Ra is mostly situational. He performs well in Delusions Den and PVP, as well as in Odysseus, but his performance in other areas is average.

pvp.title: Best PVP Setup
pvp.description: Control Meta with Black Hole setup.

skills.name: Aten's Radiance
skills.description: Amun-Ra releases solar energy and rises into air, gaining Super Armor. He fires a solar blade to strike the nearest enemy and nearby targets, dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK. When cast, it does not drain Energy but consumes 200 Energy per sec.

upgrades.level2: Solar blades heal Amun-Ra for 100% of the DMG dealt.
upgrades.level3: Increases the DMG of solar blades to 140% ATK.
upgrades.level4: Reduces the attack interval of solar blades to 0.7s.

skills.name: Blinding Sun-Disk
skills.description: Amun-Ra creates a Solar Aura near himself for 6s, dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK per sec to enemies inside and reducing their ATK by 20%.

upgrades.level2: Enemies inside Solar Aura have their ATK reduced by 30%.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG per instance to 125% ATK.
upgrades.level4: Extends the duration of Solar Aura to 8s.

skills.name: Glare of Ra
skills.description: Amun-Ra gains 100% Dodge Rate for 8s at combat start.

upgrades.level2: Re-enters this state each time he casts the Ultimate.
upgrades.level3: Dodging an attack restores 50 Energy to Amun-Ra for the duration. This can only trigger once per sec.
upgrades.level4: Additionally gains 50% Effect RES for the duration. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

skills.name: The Dawn on Benben
skills.description: Increases all allies' M-RES and Armor by 50% for 15s at combat start. Amun-Ra gains Energy Regen boost, increasing his Energy Regen by 50%, until any ally falls.

upgrades.level2: When the Energy Regen boost expires, all allies instantly restore 200 Energy.
upgrades.level4: Increases his Energy Regen to 80%. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

relic.name: Sun-Blinded
relic.description: Blinding Sun-Disk remains permanently when cast, and its range moderately expands during Aten's Radiance. Enemies within range of Blinding Sun-Disk for 4s are stunned for 1s.

upgrades.level2: Enemies within range of Blinding Sun-Disk for 4s are stunned for 1.5s. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Enemies within range of Blinding Sun-Disk for 4s are stunned for 2s. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: The enhanced Blinding Sun-Disk creates a black hole during Aten's Radiance, slowly pulling all enemies on the battlefield toward Amun-Ra. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)
